member.name: IInkPresenterDesktop.GetSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the InkPresenter object.
member.param: The width of the object, in DIPs.
The height of the object, in DIPs.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkPresenterDesktop.OnHighContrastChanged
member.summary: Specifies a high contrast change handler. This handler is notified of changes to the high contrast system settings in Windows 10 and earlier (Settings -> Ease of Access -> High Contrast -> Use high contrast).
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkPresenterDesktop.SetCommitRequestHandler

summary.para: Sets an IInkCommitRequestHandler object that enables the app (instead of an IInkPresenterDesktop object) to commit all pending Microsoft DirectComposition commands to the app's DirectComposition visual tree.
This supports a custom drying mode and synchronizes the transition of "wet" ink from the IInkPresenterDesktop object to "dry" ink in the app's DirectComposition visual tree.

member.param: The IInkCommitRequestHandler that processes the ink input.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkPresenterDesktop.SetRootVisual
member.summary: Sets the connection to the app's DirectComposition visual tree.
member.param: NULL for default ink rendering, or an object used to commit all pending DirectComposition commands for custom drying of ink input to the app's DirectComposition visual tree.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkPresenterDesktop.SetSize
member.summary: Sets the size of the InkPresenter object.
member.param: The width of the object, in DIPs.
The height of the object, in DIPs.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInkPresenterDesktop
member.summary: An IInkPresenterDesktop object represents an InkPresenter that can be configured and inserted into the DirectComposition visual tree of the Classic Windows app.
